text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: Shoot 'em ups (also known as shmups) are a sub-genre of shooter video games. There is no consensus as to which design elements compose a shoot 'em up; some restrict the definition to games featuring spacecraft and certain types of character movement, while others allow a broader definition including characters on foot and a variety of perspectives.
